channel.description: Documentation for Structural Genomics tool TADkit, for displaying 3D genomics data produced by TADbit.

item.title: Welcome to TADkit!
item.description:
Welcome to the updated TADkit documentation site. Currently we are developing Tadkit v1.0 for release in February 2017. Meanwhile v0.2 includes the following updates:

  • Automated extraction of ngdoc tags API via Dgeni.
  • Documentation site via Github Pages with Jekyll.
  • Fix to THREEjs memory leak.
